host_templates._comment:
{FR: Modèle pour superviser les baies de stockage Netapp via l'API OnCommand}
{EN: Template to check Netapp Storage using OnCommand API}
host_templates.alias: Template to check Netapp storage using OnCommand API
host_templates.name: HW-Storage-NetApp-Ontap-Oncommandapi

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor NetApp storage using OnCommand API :
* Aggregate-Raid-Status
* Aggregate-Status
* Aggregate-Usage
* Cluster-Ioo
* Cluster-Status
* Cluster-Usage
* Disk-Failed
* Disk-Spare
* FC-Port-Status
* Lun-Alignment
* Lun-Online
* Lun-Usage
* Node-Failover-Status
* Node-Hardware-Status
* Qtree-Status
* Snapmirror-Status
* Snapmirror-Usage
* Volumes

Plugin pack pour superviser le stockage NetApp l\'API OnCommand :
* Aggregate-Raid-Status
* Aggregate-Status
* Aggregate-Usage
* Cluster-Ioo
* Cluster-Status
* Cluster-Usage
* Disk-Failed
* Disk-Spare
* FC-Port-Status
* Lun-Alignment
* Lun-Online
* Lun-Usage
* Node-Failover-Status
* Node-Hardware-Status
* Qtree-Status
* Snapmirror-Status
* Snapmirror-Usage
* Volumes
